snippet: No group has claimed responsibility, but the attack is similar to others carried out by Boko Haram, a homegrown Islamist extremist group.
abstract: Nigerian official reports that several bombs in two suburbs of capital Abuja have killed 15 people and injured at least 41; attacks are similar to those by Boko Haram in region, but no one has claimed responsibility.
lead_paragraph: No group has claimed responsibility, but the attack is similar to others carried out by Boko Haram, a homegrown Islamist extremist group.

headline.main: Bombs in Nigerian Capital Kill 15 in Surge of Violence
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Africa; Nigeria: At Least 15 Dead After Bombings Near Capital
